Ingredients.6: 1 medium carrot, peeled and thinly sliced into 1-inch strips

Ingredients.7: 0.5  cucumber, peeled and thinly sliced into 1-inch strips

Ingredients.8: 6 pieces imitation crab sticks, chopped, or more to taste

Ingredients.13: 2  sheets nori, torn into nickel-sized pieces

Ingredients.14: 0.5  ripe avocado, cut into small pieces

Ingredients.15: 1 tablespoon sesame seeds, or as needed (Optional)

Directions.1: Bring water and rice to a boil in a saucepan, about 5 minutes. Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until rice is tender and water has been absorbed, 20 to 25 minutes.

Directions.2: Combine rice vinegar, sugar, and salt to a slight boil in a saucepan, about 5 minutes. Stir until dissolved and let cool 2 minutes. Pour mixture over cooked rice. Transfer to a serving bowl.

Directions.3: Combine carrot, cucumber, crab sticks, ginger, water, wasabi, and oil in a bowl.

Directions.4: Combine wet crab mixture with cooked rice in the serving bowl. Add avocado and nori just before serving. Sprinkle sesame seeds on top.
